root.name: Domino Master
root.description: Domino Master is a collection of five different types of Domino play styles; Straight, All 3's, All 5's, Bergen, and Mexican Train.The Single player game has three difficulty levels Including Beginner, Master, and Guru. Domino Master features 4 player online play on XBOX Live in either Player or Ranked matches.The Game also has custom rules allowing you to play the way you want. Domino Master also includes a variety of Domino sets including double sixes, double nines, or double twelve domino configurations.
